title: Lisa Cook hints 'clerical error' to blame for any mortgage application discrepancy
description: The document calls the fraud allegation "unsubstantiated and unproven" but does not go into detail about why that is the case.
body: The document calls the fraud allegation "unsubstantiated and unproven" but does not go into detail about why that is the case.

title: Trump railroad regulator was fired by White House after Amtrak Acela unveiling
description: "I was just as surprised as anyone," the former board member, Robert Primus, said in an interview with CNBC's Eamon Javers.
body: "I was just as surprised as anyone," the former board member, Robert Primus, said in an interview with CNBC's Eamon Javers.

title: Nvidia's top two mystery customers made up 39% of the chipmaker's Q2 revenue
description: Nvidia's top two customers making up 39% of its total revenue is renewing concern about the risk of the chipmakers clientele concentration.
body: Nvidia's top two customers making up 39% of its total revenue is renewing concern about the risk of the chipmakers clientele concentration.

title: Pure Storage stock soars 32% to record as Meta deal bolsters results, outlook
description: Shares of Pure Storage had their best day ever and closed at a record after the company reported better than expected results and lifted its guidance.
body: Shares of Pure Storage had their best day ever and closed at a record after the company reported better than expected results and lifted its guidance.

title: Dell beats on profit and revenue as company says AI server sales will double this year
description: Dell said it now plans to ship $20 billion of AI servers in its fiscal 2026, double what it sold last year.
body: Dell said it now plans to ship $20 billion of AI servers in its fiscal 2026, double what it sold last year.

title: Gap stock falls 10% as retailer misses sales expectations, driven by decline at Athleta
description: Gap posted mixed fiscal second quarter results, beating on earnings per share but missing on revenue after Athleta saw sales decline 11%.
body: Gap posted mixed fiscal second quarter results, beating on earnings per share but missing on revenue after Athleta saw sales decline 11%.

title: The vaccine and public health debate at the center of CDC upheaval, explained
description: The White House on Thursday said President Donald Trump had fired CDC Director Susan Monarez after she refused to resign.
body: The White House on Thursday said President Donald Trump had fired CDC Director Susan Monarez after she refused to resign.
